code: import*as ACTION_TYPES from'./action_types';export var SUCCESS={type:ACTION_TYPES.SUCCESS};export var FAILURE={type:ACTION_TYPES.FAILURE};export var success=function success(){return{type:ACTION_TYPES.SUCCESS};};export var failure=function failure(){return{type:ACTION_TYPES.FAILURE};};export var add_profile=function add_profile(profile){return{type:ACTION_TYPES.ADD_PROFILE,payload:profile};};export var remove_profile=function remove_profile(){return{type:ACTION_TYPES.REMOVE_PROFILE};};export var login_success=function login_success(){return{type:ACTION_TYPES.LOGIN_SUCCESS};};export var login_failure=function login_failure(){return{type:ACTION_TYPES.LOGIN_FAILURE};};export var user_input_change=function user_input_change(text){return{type:ACTION_TYPES.USER_INPUT_CHANGE,payload:text};};export var user_input_submit=function user_input_submit(text){return{type:ACTION_TYPES.USER_INPUT_SUBMIT,payload:text};};export var set_db_profile=function set_db_profile(profile){return{type:ACTION_TYPES.SET_DB_PROFILE,payload:profile};};export var remove_db_profile=function remove_db_profile(){return{type:ACTION_TYPES.REMOVE_DB_PROFILE};};export var set_db_posts=function set_db_posts(posts){return{type:ACTION_TYPES.FETCH_DB_POSTS,payload:posts};};export var remove_db_posts=function remove_db_posts(){return{type:ACTION_TYPES.REMOVE_DB_POSTS};};
